duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Store Manager and Assistant Store Manager in meeting retail store targets by driving sales.
Responsible for opening and closing the store in the absence of other managers, ensuring safe and legal trading.
Deliver sales through friendly and efficient customer service.
Assist with store deliveries, visual merchandising, stock takes, markdowns, and promotions.
Provide product information to customers, assist with their queries, and perform ear piercing after receiving full training.
Ensure the store is presentable and inviting to customers.
